title: Harden Jira/Linear two-way sync: retries, backoff, and dead-letter handling for failed sync runs

sections.text: Implement resilient processing for upstream/inbound sync failures by adding automatic retries with exponential backoff, idempotency safeguards, and a dead-letter state when errors persist (e.g., permission revoked, issue deleted, rate limits). Persist a per-link sync error code/message and failure count so the UI status panel can display actionable details without repeated failing calls. Ensure failures don’t break the existing link mapping and that successful subsequent runs clear error state.
